Entries.DialogueText: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.

Entries.DialogueText: Just ask me if you need anything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just ask me if you need anything.

Entries.DialogueText: I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.

Entries.DialogueText: I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this , okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.

Entries.DialogueText: You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?

Entries.DialogueText: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.

Entries.DialogueText: Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.

Entries.DialogueText: Stop by whenever you wanna relax.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stop by whenever you wanna relax.

Entries.DialogueText: Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.

Entries.DialogueText: That was a very auspicious wedding ceremony, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was a very auspicious wedding ceremony, .

Entries.DialogueText: ...What? You didn't see me there?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...What? You didn't see me there?

Entries.DialogueText: Hahaha... Kid... You can't keep a secret from Mr. Qi.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hahaha... Kid... You can't keep a secret from Mr. Qi.

Entries.DialogueText: There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid. Some day, you might understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid. Some day, you might understand.

Entries.DialogueText: For now, just keep striving for excellence in everything you do.
Entries.DisplayPattern: For now, just keep striving for excellence in everything you do.

Entries.DialogueText: I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: You see... The mind is a very powerful tool.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see... The mind is a very powerful tool.

Entries.DialogueText: In fact, it's the most powerful tool in all of reality... and beyond.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In fact, it's the most powerful tool in all of reality... and beyond.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm impressed with your tenacity, kid... it took a lot of walnuts to get this far.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm impressed with your tenacity, kid... it took a lot of walnuts to get this far.

Entries.DialogueText: Wherever you go... I'm always behind the curtain, making sure the show is interesting. Hahaha...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wherever you go... I'm always behind the curtain, making sure the show is interesting. Hahaha...

Entries.DialogueText: Or... am I?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or... am I?

Entries.DialogueText: Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.

Entries.DialogueText: It's always within your power to go one step further than you used to believe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's always within your power to go one step further than you used to believe.

Entries.DialogueText: Some things transcend time and space, kid. It's a unique feeling in the heart... a whisper of things beyond.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some things transcend and space, kid. It's a unique feeling in the heart... a whisper of things beyond.

Entries.DialogueText: On the left, you'll find a board with my special challenges... custom-tailored for you, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: On the left, you'll find a board with my special challenges... custom-tailored for you, kid.

Entries.DialogueText: On the right, a set of fantastic prizes for those who meet my challenge...
Entries.DisplayPattern: On the right, a set of fantastic prizes for those who meet my challenge...

Entries.DialogueText: Good luck, kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good luck, kid.
